channel.title: [PI] Runtime error.*FIXED*
channel.description:
[code]Exception in thread "main" java.lang.ExceptionInInitializerError Caused by: java.lang.NumberFormatException: For input string: "Mining Instructor " at java.lang.NumberFormatException.forInputString(NumberFormatException. java:65) at java.lang.Integer.parseInt(Integer.java:492) at java.lang.Integer.parseInt(Integer.java:527) at server.model.npcs.NPCHandler.loadAutoSpawn(NPCHandler.java:3857) at server.model.npcs.NPCHandler.<init>(NPCHandler.java:33) at server.Server.<clinit>(Server.java:62) Press any key to continue . . .[/code] I thought it was something in the only CFG file I edited, Spawn-Config.cfg and nothing is wrong in it. So could someone help me?
OHH LOL! It wasn't a matter of tabbing or spacing it was the fact that I left out the npc id. Haha, it got deleted some how. Thanks though.

item.title: [PI] Runtime error.*FIXED*
item.dc:creator: @Da_Vein Da Vein
item.description:
@Da_Vein wrote:

[quote=“RiiPiiNFtW, post:2, topic:462890”]It is spawn-config.java. You sure you used tab instead of space?[/quote]Yes, let me make sure though.

EDIT: Yes, I am 100% sure there are no spaces in it…

Read full topic

It is spawn-config.java. You sure you used tab instead of space?

item.title: [PI] Runtime error.*FIXED*
item.dc:creator: @Da_Vein Da Vein
item.description:
@Da_Vein wrote:

Exception in thread "main" java.lang.ExceptionInInitializerError Caused by: java.lang.NumberFormatException: For input string: "Mining Instructor " at java.lang.NumberFormatException.forInputString(NumberFormatException. java:65) at java.lang.Integer.parseInt(Integer.java:492) at java.lang.Integer.parseInt(Integer.java:527) at server.model.npcs.NPCHandler.loadAutoSpawn(NPCHandler.java:3857) at server.model.npcs.NPCHandler.<init>(NPCHandler.java:33) at server.Server.<clinit>(Server.java:62) Press any key to continue . . .
I thought it was something in the only CFG file I edited, Spawn-Config.cfg and nothing is wrong in it. So could someone help me?

OHH LOL! It wasn’t a matter of tabbing or spacing it was the fact that I left out the npc id. Haha, it got deleted some how. Thanks though.
